DOC.HEADLINE: PACIFIC WATCH : JAPAN
DOC.TEXT: Importers See 15 % Rise in Car Sales : Sales of vehicles imported into Japan will rise to about 345 # 000 in 1995 , an industry association predicted . Japan ' s auto imports have surged this year as the high yen has made imports cheaper and foreign makers have stepped_up their marketing efforts.The Japan Automobile Importers Assn . said the country ' s economic recovery will help the trend continue in the new year by boosting personal consumption . The association said 269 # 568 imported cars , trucks and buses were sold in the first 11 months of 1994 , up 48.8 % from the same period last year . Imports held a 5.9 % share of the total vehicle market , up from 4.1 % last year . This year has already broken the 1990 record , when 223 # 923 foreign-made vehicles were sold in Japan .
